channel.title: GETTING STARTED on Welcome to stegos!
channel.description: Recent content in GETTING STARTED on Welcome to stegos!

item.title: Introduction to Stegos
item.description: Stegos is a fully private blockchain that provides users with a simple, secure and most importantly complete approach to their online communications and transactions. Other privacy coins focus solely on providing untraceable transactions, but this is just one part of the equation: users need to be able to communicate privately before making these transactions, or they will leak metadata which governments and other malicious actors can use to identify them.
